name: Varstar
tagline: Period Estimation for Quasi-Periodical Mira Variable Stars
body:
## R Package
 ```VarStar``` is an R package to fit Mira light curves with Gaussian process model. Two versions of the model are provided, one sophisticated version for densely sampled Mira light curve, and one simple sinusoid version for sparsely sampled light curve.


## Installation
Prerequisite R packages are Rcpp, RcppArmadillo. Use the following code to install from Github.

```r
library(devtools)
install_github("shiyuanhe/varStar/varStar")
```

## Usage example

1. [Fitting a Densely Observed Mira Light Curve](./example/example1.html)


## Reference
* Shiyuan He, Wenlong Yuan, Jianhua Z. Huang, James Long, Lucas M. Macri (2016) Period estimation for sparsely-sampled quasi-periodic light curves applied to Miras. [http://arxiv.org/abs/1609.06680](http://arxiv.org/abs/1609.06680)
